name: Space Genocide
description:
A simple 2D Shooter with modifications to original (default) project
- Changed 1st level win condition to destruction of Alien space stations, also added powerups gained from destroying said stations (firerate up) and destructible environment
- Made 2nd level's win condition into going through portal (big black hole)
- 3rd and final level is destruction of Alien's homeworld, which will endlessly spawn aliens for it's defence until it's inevitable demise

Credits

Created by Orihs
